title: Not even a report bots option?
body: Every queue except for 5v5 normals and ranked is flooded with bots and NOTHING IS BEING DONE.

replies.body: You use the cheating aka 3rd party add-ons report.

> [{quoted}](name=jpguy902,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1PLHeKZn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-02T20:52:02.868+0000)
>
> Isnt cheating a report option?

Bots isn't cheating they are more stupid then smart, I think Csing doesn't like them on his team who are stupid as hell. From what I know Riot usually takes out bots/elo booster/account share each end of the season so pretty much you have to wait for 1 year until Riot actually does the ban hand out for these cases.
I didnt mean cheating as in winning, I meant cheating as in setting a very basic script to grind levels in bot games. I know the bots are terrible.

> [{quoted}](name=LegendmakerGX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1PLHeKZn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-02T22:46:18.036+0000)
>
> Bots isn't cheating they are more stupid then smart, I think Csing doesn't like them on his team who are stupid as hell. From what I know Riot usually takes out bots/elo booster/account share each end of the season so pretty much you have to wait for 1 year until Riot actually does the ban hand out for these cases.

Using scripts to level accounts IS cheating, bud.
Personally I use the cheating /unauthorized 3rd party programs  option and explain they're farming bots in the description. IDK if it works or not, but that's what I do.
Well do you think they're using the league client to control these bots? No they're using 3rd party software. So use that. And your brain next time.
this is a big issue rito needs to fix but they're too focused permanently banning those who flame to care about cheaters and botters
